entry.title: Install Softwares for High-energy Astronomy
entry.content: 1 Introduction This is a brief instruction of installing softwares for high-energy astronomy on my Archlinux 2 HEASOFT 2.1 Download Visit here to download the source code 2.2 Unpack to the installation directory cd /usr/local/sudo tar zxvf /path/to/the/downloaded/file/heasoft-6.17src.tar.gz 2.3 Install cd heasoft-6.17/BUILD_DIRsudo ./configuresudo makesudo make install this may take some time, so be patient : -) or you can have a coffee ~ 2.4 Set environment Add following code to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc export HEADAS=/usr/local/heasoft-6.17/(PLATFORM)alias heainit=". $HEADAS/headas-init.sh" where (PLATFORM) is a placeholder for the platform-specific string denoting your machine's architecture, for example: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-libc2. 22 on my Archlinux 2.5 Check Run heainit in your unix prompt 3 XMM SAS 3.1 Download Download from here 3.2 Unpack sudo mkdir /usr/local/SAScd /usr/local/SASsudo tar zxf /path/to/the/downloaded/file/sas_14.0.0-<OS>.tgz 3.3 Run the installation file sudo ./install.sh 3.4 Set environment Add following code to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc alias sasinit=". /usr/local/SAS/xmmsas_20141104_1833/setsas.sh" 3.5 Check Run sasinit in your unix prompt 4 CALDB 4.1 Download Chandra Visit here to download Chandra caldb Others Visit here to download caldb of missions needed such as Suzaku 4.2 Unpack mkdir ~/caldbcd ~/caldbtar zxvf /path/to/the/downloaded/file/caldb_4.6.9_main.tar.gztar zxvf /path/to/the/downloaded/file/goodfiles_suzaku_xis_bcf_20151005.tar.gztar zxvf /path/to/the/downloaded/file/goodfiles_suzaku_xis_cpf_20151005.tar.gztar zxvf /path/to/the/downloaded/file/goodfiles_suzaku_xis_index_20151005.tar.gz 4.3 Set environment Add following code to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc export CALDB=$HOME/caldbexport CALDBCONFIG=$CALDB/software/tools/caldb.configexport CALDBALIAS=$CALDB/software/tools/alias_config.fits 5 CIAO 5.1 Before installation link installed CALDB to your CIAO installation directory ln -s ~/caldb ~/ciao-4.7/CALDB 5.2 Download ciao-install and run it Download from here ./ciao-install just install ciao to your home directory : -) 5.3 Install dependences yaourt -S libselinux and any other if required 5.4 Set environment Add following code to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc alias ciao="source ~/ciao-4.7/bin/ciao.bash" 5.5 Check ciaocheck_ciao_caldb 6 ISIS 6.1 Install dependencies Make sure that slang has been installed 6.2 Clone source by git git clone http://space.mit.edu/cxc/isis/isis.git ~/Downloads/isis-src 6.3 Build and install cd ~/Downloads/isis-src./configure --with-headas=$HEADASmakemake checksudo make install 6.4 Check installation Typing isis at your unix prompt Last Updated 2016-11-26 Sat 00:25.Rendered by
